005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter;
007
008import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.jsonFormatVisitors.JsonFormatTypes;
009
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.AbstractDataTypeAdapter;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IIPv6AddressItem;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
014
015import java.util.List;
016
017import javax.xml.namespace.QName;
018
019import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
020import inet.ipaddr.AddressStringException;
021import inet.ipaddr.IPAddressString;
022import inet.ipaddr.IPAddressStringParameters;
023import inet.ipaddr.IncompatibleAddressException;
024import inet.ipaddr.ipv6.IPv6Address;
025
026public class IPv6AddressAdapter
027    extends AbstractDataTypeAdapter<IPv6Address, IIPv6AddressItem> {
028  @NonNull
029  private static final List<QName> NAMES = ObjectUtils.notNull(
030      List.of(new QName(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH.toASCIIString(), "ip-v6-address")));
031  private static final IPAddressStringParameters IP_V_6;
032
033  static {
034    IP_V_6 = new IPAddressStringParameters.Builder().allowIPv4(false).allowEmpty(false).allowSingleSegment(false)
035        .allowWildcardedSeparator(false).getIPv6AddressParametersBuilder().allowBinary(false)
036        .allowPrefixesBeyondAddressSize(false).getParentBuilder().toParams();
037  }
038
039  IPv6AddressAdapter() {
040    super(IPv6Address.class);
041  }
042
043  @Override
044  public List<QName> getNames() {
045    return NAMES;
046  }
047
048  @Override
049  public JsonFormatTypes getJsonRawType() {
050    return JsonFormatTypes.STRING;
051  }
052
053  @SuppressWarnings("null")
054  @Override
055  public IPv6Address parse(String value) {
056    try {
057      return (IPv6Address) new IPAddressString(value, IP_V_6).toAddress();
058    } catch (AddressStringException | IncompatibleAddressException ex) {
059      throw new IllegalArgumentException(ex.getLocalizedMessage(), ex);
060    }
061  }
062
063  @Override
064  public IPv6Address copy(Object obj) {
065    // value is immutable
066    return (IPv6Address) obj;
067  }
068
069  @Override
070  public Class<IIPv6AddressItem> getItemClass() {
071    return IIPv6AddressItem.class;
072  }
073
074  @Override
075  public IIPv6AddressItem newItem(Object value) {
076    IPv6Address item = toValue(value);
077    return IIPv6AddressItem.valueOf(item);
078  }
079}
